dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is an image classification dataset containing 10 labels/classes of images, each of which has 6,000 images. Among the 60,000 images, 50,000 are used for model training and 10,000 for model testing.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:description: MNIST is a handwritten digits dataset that includes many 28Ã—28 pixel grayscale images of handwritten single digits between 0 and 9. The whole dataset has a training set of 60,000 examples and a test set of 10,000 examples.
dcterms:title: MNIST
